version_description:
Ver 1.2.0:
● Smartly showing English candidates you may want when typing letters.

Ver 2.8.2 changes:
● Add 207 new Emoji characters.
● Make the first guessing phrase more accurate.

version_name: 1.4.1 adds a clear button on composing text

version_description: NEW! Proximity correction: it'll smartly guess what word or phrase you want to input from neighbor keys.
Version 1.4.1 adds a clear button on composing text, and adds a new color "blue on black."

Ver 1.4.2:
* Fixes a keyboard positioning problem when WiFi hotspot is on.

Ver 1.4.3:
＊Adds a new keyboard color "Goldenrod."
＊Fixes a key repeating bug.
＊Fixes a crash bug.

Ver 1.4.4:
＊Works for iOS 10: uses Swift 3, and fixes a problem of reading address book.
＊Earth and Flag keys are enabled to show keyboard picker menu by long pressing or sliding up.
Ver 1.4.5: fixes a keyboard size problem of low resolution app in iOS 10.

Ver 1.4.6:
● improves startup performance.
● automatically adds a question mark after phrases ended with 嗎.

Ver 1.4.7：
● fixes a keyboard size problem on iOS 9.x.

Ver 1.4.8：
● can backup/restore user dictionary to/from iCloud Drive.

Ver 2.0.0:
● finally upgrades kernel to the cutting-edge techniques of Statistical Language Model.
● adds 4 more syllables to the longest length of words you can input, to 14 syllables.
● adds a new keyboard color "purple."
● fixes a bug of pr

Ver 2.0.1：
● fixes some issues for iOS 11.
● finally upgrades kernel to the cutting-edge techniques of Statistical Language Model.
● adds 4 more syllables to the longest length of words you can input, to 14 syllables.
● adds a new keyboard col

Ver 2.0.2：
● fixes some issues for iOS 11.
● finally upgrades kernel to the cutting-edge techniques of Statistical Language Model.
● adds 4 more syllables to the longest length of words you can input, to 14 syllables.
● adds a new keyboard col

Ver 2.0.3：
● fixes some issues of iPhone X.
● fixes a bug of output wrong character sometimes.

Ver 2.0.4:
● fixes screen rotation and keyboard height adjustment problems for iPhone Xs/Xs Max/Xr.
● updates Chaozhuyin dictionaries.

iOS Ver 2.0.5:
● fixes screen rotation and keyboard height adjustment problems for iPhone Xs/Xs Max/Xr.
● updates Chaozhuyin dictionaries.

Ver 2.0.6:
● fixes screen edge touching problem for iPhone X/XS/XS Max/XR.
● reduces the chance of hitting the wrong key.
● adjusts the color of the apple grey.
● English and Eiten keyboard comma key changes to four punctuation sliding key.

Ver 2.0.7：
● supports dark mode in setting screen.
● adds functionality for haptic feedback (only iPhone 7 / 7 Plus or newer).
● stability improvement.

Ver 2.0.8:
● Fix the problem that sometimes the keyboard will jump back to English mode.
● Fix the problem that iPhone SE 2020 cannot turn on the clicking vibration.

Ver 2.0.9:
● enhances stability.
● Fix the problem that iPhone SE 2020 cannot turn on the clicking vibration.

Ver 2.1.0:
● 手指在键盘上左右滑动可以控制游标左右移动。
● 增加参数：动画显示键盘选择扇子。

Ver 2.1.1:
● 解决iPhone 12无法设定按键振动的问题。
